steps.step: Select a row in the Data Grid.
Click the down arrow to the left of COMPRESSION STATION in the Layer Dropdown List.
Click the checkbox to the left of COMPRESSION STATION.
Click the checkbox to the left of LEASE.
Type a number in the Distance field.
Click on a portion of the lease displayed on the map to define the center point.
All the leases that are within the 5 mile radius display on the map and Data Grid.
